sentences.sContent: His mannerisms are more those of a preoccupied maths professor.
sentences.sCn: 他的言谈举止更像是一个全神贯注的数学教授。

synos.tran: 特殊习惯；矫揉造作；怪癖

remMethod.val: manner(风格， 方式) + ism(表风格、 特征) → 个人独有的言行 → 怪癖

words.tran: 矫饰的；守规矩的；矫揉造作的
方式；习惯；种类；规矩；风俗

trans.tranCn: 特殊习惯；矫揉造作；怪癖
trans.tranOther: Someone's mannerisms are the gestures or ways of speaking that are very characteristic of them, and which they often use
